backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining types and CRUD logic for farmer profiles, advisories, prices, schemes, soil reports, expert queries, and authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that discards incompatible legacy library data and initializes empty agriculture-related maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of all frontend files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining agriculture-themed OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file that loads the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication, admin routing, profile setup, and rendering public or admin views.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Screen shown to non-admin users attempting admin access with logout support.
frontend/src/components/admin/BooksManag: Placeholder admin component with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/CropAdviso: Provides CRUD UI for crop advisories using dialogs, tables, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventsMana: Empty admin component with no functional code.
frontend/src/components/admin/ExpertQuer: Manages expert queries, allowing viewing and responding through dialogs and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/Government: Full CRUD interface for government schemes with dialog-based add/edit actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/LibrarySet: Empty admin component without any implemented features.
frontend/src/components/admin/MandiPrice: CRUD management UI for mandi price entries with validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/MembersMan: Placeholder admin component with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, branding, and a referral link with app identifier tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with language selection, admin toggle, and login/logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Displays an alert showing that the app is offline using i18n text.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal form for creating a user profile with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/public/CropAdvis: Displays crop advisories with offline fallback and allows users to submit expert queries with optional image attachments.
frontend/src/components/public/ExpertSup: Shows user-submitted expert queries and provides a dialog to submit new questions with optional images.
frontend/src/components/public/Governmen: Fetches and displays government schemes with offline caching and expandable details for each scheme.
frontend/src/components/public/MandiPric: Displays mandi prices with search, offline fallback, and an optional compare mode for selected items.
frontend/src/components/public/SoilHealt: Lists soil health reports and provides a form for authenticated users to add new soil reports.
frontend/src/components/public/WeatherMo: Shows current weather stats and a static 7‑day forecast using mock weather data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading and managing identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguagePreference: Syncs user language preference with profile data and updates profile when language changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with react‑query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, advisories, prices, schemes, and queries.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides i18n context with language state, persistence, and translation lookup.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.ts: Contains English and Hindi translation dictionaries for UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard displaying counts and management tabs for advisories, prices, schemes, and expert queries.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHome.tsx: Renders the public homepage with module tabs (weather, advisory, prices, schemes, soil, expert) and a hero section, managing active module state and offline indicators.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Provides image file validation for type and size plus a helper to convert files to base64 strings.
frontend/src/utils/offlineCache.ts: Implements localStorage-based caching with timestamps and utilities to detect offline-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the agriculture platform’s goals, features, architecture notes, and required images.
